casebody.data:
Douglas BATES, Plaintiff,
v.
TOWNSHIP OF JACKSON, Defendant,
and
County of Ocean, Defendant,
and
State of New Jersey, Scott W. Allerton, and Lori Allerton, Defendants. Douglas Bates, Plaintiff-Respondent,
v.
Township of Jackson, Defendant,
and
County of Ocean, Defendant-Petitioner,
and
State of New Jersey, Scott W. Allerton, and Lori Allerton, Defendants. C-889 September Term 2018
082135 Supreme Court of New Jersey. May 14, 2019

ORDER

A petition for certification of the judgment in A-0588/0667-17 having been submitted to this Court, and the Court having considered the same;

It is ORDERED that the petition for certification is denied, with costs.
